pullrequest.title: Plotting Palette: Refresh when models are inserted or deleted

content.raw: It seems possible that two threads could enter this function simultaneously. This could happen because the `FillModels` function subscribes to a topic with `OnIntrospectionUpdate` as the callback, and also uses `OnIntrospectionUpdate` for the `IntrospectionClient` callback. Might want to put a mutex here.
